value.title: StarCraft 2 - Beginner Protoss Opening | The PiG Daily #155
value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Feinting Attacks" - A feint is where you give the impression of attacking in one place where its fake or just a small distraction from the real thrust of your attack. Examples: Using empty drops or hallucinations to pull your opponent out of position!  Send submissions to

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Protoss Beginner Guide #1 (Updated Patch 4.0 FREE TO PLAY)
value.excerpt: How to command the incredibly strong forces of the protoss and cover weaknesses against the other inferior races. Updated for patch 4.0! This guide is not intended for COMPLETELY new players, but those who have played several games/campaign missions and grasp the very basics.

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Terran Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: A new and hopefully improved version of my guides for each race where I go over as many basics as possible while doing it live :)  I strongly believe that a super structured guide style is not very helpful compared to watching/playing the game actively.  Feedback is greatly appreciated. -- Watch live

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Zerg Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017)
value.excerpt: We go over the basic mechanics of zerg and show the importance of understanding at least some of what your opponent is doing. value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 001 - Tutorial
value.excerpt: A newbie guide for Starcraft 2 multiplayer!  In this first episode, we'll cover the game's very first introductory missions—the Tutorial missions—which are designed specifically for players who have never touched Starcraft before.  Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5UmyuxWKXvrNOHKIp9VWkMMikqE9AOxZ

value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 005 - Training: Stage 3

value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 008 - Applying Pressure
value.excerpt: Constantly scout your opponent, and don't be afraid to apply pressure.  By keeping your opponent pinned, you create opportunities to get further ahead.
